Uses of Interface
com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters.TokenFilter

  • Packages that use TokenFilter 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane
    Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.standoff
    A package for converting to and from CoNLL-X to standoff format, for interaction with annoation tools requiring this format.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser
    Transition-based dependency parsing (Parser), evaluation (ParserEvaluator), and output artefacts (ParseConfiguration, DependencyNode).
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
    Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
    The central class is the (PosTagger).
    It tags based on a previously constructed classificaton model, converting the model's outcomes to PosTag using the currently set PosTagSet.
    The PosTagSet is set via TalismaneSession.setPosTagSet(PosTagSet).
    The pos-tagger prodces a PosTagSequence which is a list of PosTaggedToken.
    It can be evaluated via a PosTaggerEvaluator.
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector
    Training and evaluation for sentence detectors.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
    Tokenisation package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters
    Token filters, which indicate portions of text to be tokenised as a single block, regardless of the statistical model (if it exists).

      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector that return types with arguments of type TokenFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<TokenFilter> SentenceDetector.getTokenFilters()
      Token filters mark certain portions of the raw text as entire tokens - a sentence break will never be detected inside such a token.

    • Uses of TokenFilter in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser

      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser that return types with arguments of type TokenFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<TokenFilter> TokenRegexBasedCorpusReader.getTokenFilters() 
      List<TokenFilter> TokeniserAnnotatedCorpusReader.getTokenFilters()
      #see TokeniserAnnotatedCorpusReader.addTokenFilter(TokenFilter)
      List<TokenFilter> Tokeniser.getTokenFilters()
      Filters to be applied prior to breaking the sentence up into atomic token sequences - these filters will mark certain portions of the sentence as entire tokens, and the tokeniser will not take any decisions inside these.
      List<TokenFilter> AbstractTokeniser.getTokenFilters() 
      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser with parameters of type TokenFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TokenRegexBasedCorpusReader.addTokenFilter(TokenFilter tokenFilter) 
      void TokeniserAnnotatedCorpusReader.addTokenFilter(TokenFilter tokenFilter)
      These filters will not be used to detect tokens, as token boundaries are provided by the corpus.
      void Tokeniser.addTokenFilter(TokenFilter filter)
      See Tokeniser.getTokenFilters().
      void AbstractTokeniser.addTokenFilter(TokenFilter filter) 

    • Uses of TokenFilter in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters

      Subinterfaces of TokenFilter in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  TokenRegexFilter
      A token filter which recognises a token based on a regular expression.
      Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters that implement TokenFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractRegexFilter
      A parent class for TokenRegexFilter implementations, which knows how to construct the Pattern using the various attributes set and the initial regex, and how to apply the regex to get the matching placeholders.
      class  AttributeRegexFilter
      A TokenRegexFilter which only adds attributes to contained tokens, without delimiting a single token.
      class  TokenRegexFilterImpl
      A default implementation for token regex filters.
      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters that return TokenFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TokenFilter TokenFilterFactory.getTokenFilter(String descriptor)
      Gets a TokenFilter corresponding to a given descriptor.
      TokenFilter TokenFilterFactory.getTokenFilter(String descriptor, Map<String,String> defaultParams) 
      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters that return types with arguments of type TokenFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<TokenFilter> TokenFilterFactory.readTokenFilters(File file, Charset charset, List<String> descriptors)
      Similar to TokenFilterFactory.readTokenFilters(Scanner, List), but keeps a reference to the file, useful for finding the location of any descriptor errors.
      List<TokenFilter> TokenFilterFactory.readTokenFilters(Scanner scanner)
      Reads a sequence of token filters from a scanner.
      List<TokenFilter> TokenFilterFactory.readTokenFilters(Scanner scanner, List<String> descriptors)
      Reads a sequence of token filters from a file, and stores their descriptors in the provided paramater.
      List<TokenFilter> TokenFilterFactory.readTokenFilters(Scanner scanner, String path, List<String> descriptors)
      Reads a sequence of token filters from a scanner, with a path providing clean error reporting.
